name: Strays (Sofia Romualdo)
description:
A little prototype for a top-down game. Feed the hungry stray dogs while avoiding the sneaky foxes!

Instructions:

  • WASD to navigate
  • Space bar to throw food
  • The goal is to feed as many stray dogs as you can
  • Avoid the foxes!

Cartoon assets from Synty Studios, music and sound effects from Envato Elements.
